item.title: WordPress pre-update checklist to help avoid any problems
item.description: WordPress gets a major update about twice a year. If you’re responsible for doing the upgrade here’s a pre-update checklist for WordPress to help you identify any bugs that will get in the way of a flawless update.

item.title: Start a Social Media Marketing Plan â€“ write your plan
item.description: Start a Social Media Marketing Plan in writing - as we have all probably heard or read, putting even the vaguest plan down on paper will help to make your ideas concrete!
